summary:
•  Trilingual French, English and Russian working experience gained in international companies in Russia, Europe and Africa. Ability to learn any other language
•  Core experience: Executive Assistant, Project Assistant, event management, organisation of workshops, translation of documents
•  Over 9 years experience in legal, consulting, banking and logistics sectors
•  Highly organised, excellent time management skills and communication skills, good team player
•  Valid Dutch work permit

school.name: University of South Toulon-Var, Toulon, France

profile_positions.description:
- Administrative and executive support to the CEO and Board Members: business correspondence; calendar management (scheduling meetings, audio and video-conferences); organisation of meetings with partners, clients, staff (generating and distributing meeting documents including agenda and protocol; preparing meeting materials, binders, nameplates; arrangement of logistics, booking meeting space, catering); preparing meeting agendas, taking minutes of the Management Committee meetings; ad hoc personal tasks for the CEO; backup support for other departments.
- Travel coordination: booking flights, hotels and transfers; preparation of detailed business trip plans and itineraries; work with external travel agencies; planning and implementing visiting programmes for international guests; processing incoming invoices and travel claims. 
- Supervising office drivers’ work: handling incoming office inquiries, planning logistics and scheduling for drivers, monitoring and follow-up on task accomplishment.

Main achievements:  work experience in the banking sector; administrative support to all top management of the company;   prioritising and handling large workloads.
profile_positions.title: Executive Assistant to CEO

profile_positions.description:
- Assisting the Director in project launches: participation in planning workshops; developing cost estimates and budgets; preparing meeting minutes and other project documentation; support on location and logistics, liaison with suppliers; preparation of materials for workshops; providing reports on project status; assistance at workshops; data collection, handling and analysis on workshop procedures.

Main achievements: obtained skills in business project management during project initiation, monitoring, and closeout phases.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Assistant

profile_positions.description:
- Organisation of document flow: collection of documents required for import and export customs clearance; checking custom codes for clients’ quotations; administering database tracking system of custom clearing documents and freight movements; systemising and storing paperwork, documents and computer-based information.
- Monitoring of freights: coordination of day-to-day activities of assigned staff (liaison with custom agents, couriers, and operational departments for updated reporting procedures); communication with clients for update on freight movement; coordination of the cargo movements in the country and the delivery to clients; cross-functional coordination of activities between logistics, accounting and service team; monitoring of timely and accurate invoicing.

Main achievements: experience of working in an African country with people of a different cultural background; experience in personnel organisation; quick adaptability to work in changing policies and procedures; experience of working in logistics.

Main achievements: experience of working in an African country with people of a different cultural background; experience in personnel organisation; quick adaptability to work in changing policies and procedures.
profile_positions.title: Logistics Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
- Workflow management and full administrative support to the CEO: full inbox management; follow-up on outstanding requests from clients; arranging and coordinating external and internal meetings of the Executive; collaboration with HQ offices in Paris, London and Berlin on meeting scheduling; data management, maintenance of secure and accurate client documentation; composing and editing letters, memos, reports; arranging the participation of the Executive in Forums and Conferences; accounting of the personal budget of the Executive; staff leave and attendance recording. 
- French/English/Russian translations of documents: contracts, agreements, taxation authority reports, lease agreements, powers of attorney, passports, visas; liaison with notaries for document authentication and signature certification.
- Providing travel support: liaison with embassies for visa assistance; communication with travel partners including airlines and hotels; preparation of schedules, itineraries and expenses reports for CEO; organisation of visits of foreign guests and partners.
- Assistance to HR department: maintaining database of personnel absence records for internal and payroll purposes.

Main achievements: collaborated with other departments of company to centralise client database for easy retrieval of information; organised and implemented efficient work of support staff and logistics planning that resulted in cost savings; development of team player skills.
profile_positions.title: Personal Assistant to CEO

profile_positions.description:
- Time management for the Executive: setting up phone conferences and meetings.
- Business correspondence: reading, analysing and responding to the Executive’s emails; soliciting feedback and response.
- Travel support: planning and coordination of complex itineraries for holidays and business trips; booking tickets and hotels; arranging transfers; visa obtainment assistance.
- Assistance to HR department: vacancies posting, candidate pre-screening, scheduling job interviews and assisting in interview process.
- Planning and setting up the events: assistance in restaurant opening projects; regulating event communications; keeping records of all information related to project for documentation; liaison and negotiations with suppliers of furniture and decorations in Italy and France; monitoring project execution, reporting progress to project managers; optimising the costs according to the budget; organisation of catering; supervising the project workers and ensuring that they stick to project specification and guidelines.  

Main achievements: upgraded to a senior-level Executive Assistant position; cooperated in restaurant opening project; obtained skills to work independently; experience in recruitment of personnel.
profile_positions.title: Personal Assistant to the President

profile_positions.description:
- Workflow administration of the office: answering the phone calls and queries; sorting and distributing incoming post; sending and receiving faxes to and from clients and customers; electronic document system maintenance; booking meeting rooms; clients welcoming; acquisition of stationary for the office; archiving.
- Business trips assistance: providing visa assistance; travel and accommodation arrangement.

Main achievements:  development of general office and administrative skills; improved business communication skills; contribution to the efficient work in the office.
profile_positions.title: SECRETARY

profile_positions.description:
- Organisation of promotional and advertising events: performing of promotional activities, presentation of products, demonstration and advise (Nestlé, Smirnoff, Nivea, Danone), reporting on merchandising achievements.

Main achievements: contribution in a new launched products; 50% sale increase.
profile_positions.title: Merchandiser

company.name: ASSOCIATION OF THE RUSSIANS IN PROVENCE

profile_positions.company: ASSOCIATION OF THE RUSSIANS IN PROVENCE
profile_positions.description:
- Tourism project development: setting up and developing a tourist program aimed to attract Russian tourists to visit destinations in French Provence region; establishment of partnership with external providers (hotels, tourist offices); promotion of project to tourist agencies in Russia.

Main achievements: project management experience; developed self-management and time management skills; obtained contract signature with a Russian tourist agency.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Assistant
